text: Hope youâ€™ve all recovered from Rollers Retreat last night.
Thanks to everyone who helped with planning and coordination. And holy cow, Matthew. 231. New Uncorked record.
Just wanted to remind everyone that on Monday morning, we have the folks from Cura here for a two day semio summit.
Please come join the fabulous Paul Itzer-Prize winning journalist Nick Parish as he leads a studio-wide discussion with the team. 9:30 am. Set your alarms. Donuts (non-CBD) will be provided.

If anyone is planning on working onsite this weekend, please message me. I am going to be turning off the HVAC systems and there will be the stairs painting crew. Could be unpleasant, or could be fine. Hard to know. I'll be shutting stuff down at 5 pm today.
HVAC going off. Sorry if it's muggy. :)
